languages.text: Лорд-капитан услышал{mf||а} три необычные исповеди, заинтересовавшие е{mf|го|е}. В первых двух удалось разобрать голоса мужчин: один горевал о погибших в варпе, а второй был обеспокоен положением сирот на корабле. Третья исповедь принадлежит женщине и посвящена неким "вислоухим клеппам".

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан услышал{mf||а} три необычные исповеди, заинтересовавшие е{mf|го|е}. В первых двух удалось разобрать голоса мужчин: один горевал о погибших в варпе, а второй был обеспокоен положением сирот на корабле. Третья исповедь принадлежит женщине и посвящена неким "вислоухим клеппам".

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, and the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. Two came from men and one from a woman. Senior officers are a good starting point in searching for the senders of those messages.

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. Two came from men and one from a woman. Senior officers would be a good starting point for investigating who sent these messages.

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, and the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a entendu trois confessions inhabituelles particulièrement intéressantes. Les deux premières voix étaient masculines : l'une déplorait le triste sort des victimes du Warp, quand l'autre s'inquiétait du bien-être des orphelins à bord du vaisseau. Quant à la troisième confession, enregistrée par une femme, elle évoquait des « kleppas aux oreilles tombantes ».
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a entendu trois confessions inhabituelles particulièrement intéressantes. Les deux premières voix étaient masculines : l'une déplorait le triste sort des victimes du Warp, quand l'autre s'inquiétait du bien-être des orphelins à bord du vaisseau. Quant à la troisième confession, enregistrée par une femme, elle évoquait des « kleppas aux oreilles tombantes ».

{mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a entendu trois confessions inhabituelles particulièrement intéressantes, dont deux provenaient d'hommes, et une d'une femme. Il serait sans doute avisé de commencer à chercher les mystérieux expéditeurs de ces messages parmi les officiers supérieurs.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha oído tres confesiones de su interés. Las primeras dos voces eran de varón: una lamentaba el sino de los que habían muerto en la disformidad, mientras que la otra se preocupaba por el bienestar de los huérfanos de la nave. La tercera venía de una mujer y mencionaba «kleppas de orejas caídas».
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha oído tres confesiones de su interés. Las primeras dos voces eran de varón: una lamentaba el sino de los que habían muerto en la disformidad, mientras que la otra se preocupaba por el bienestar de los huérfanos de la nave. La tercera venía de una mujer y mencionaba «kleppas de orejas caídas».

{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha recibido tres confesiones singulares que han llamado su atención. Dos de hombres y una de una mujer. Los oficiales de mayor rango son un buen punto de partida para buscar a los remitentes.

languages.text: 行商浪人听到了三份不同寻常的告解，这让{mf|他|她}很感兴趣。前两份告解似乎来自男性，其中一个人为在亚空间死去的人们感到悲哀，而另一个人则很关心船上孤儿的福祉。第三份告解则来自一位女性，她提到了某种叫做“垂耳克莱珀”的东西。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人听到了三份不同寻常的告解，这让{mf|他|她}很感兴趣。前两份告解似乎来自男性，其中一个人为在亚空间死去的人们感到悲哀，而另一个人则很关心船上孤儿的福祉。第三份告解则来自一位女性，她提到了某种叫做“垂耳克莱珀”的东西。
领主舰长听到了三份不同寻常的告解，这让{mf|他|她}很感兴趣。其中两份告解来自男性，另一份来自女性。若想找出这些信息是谁发出来的，询问高阶军官会是个不错的选择。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは3人分の興味深い告白を聞いた。最初の二つは男性のもののようで、一人は<歪み>で死んだ人々の運命を嘆いており、もう一人は船内の孤児たちの幸福について憂いていた。三つ目は女性のもので、『ロップイヤークレッパ』について話していた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは3人分の興味深い告白を聞いた。最初の二つは男性のもののようで、一人は<歪み>で死んだ人々の運命を嘆いており、もう一人は船内の孤児たちの幸福について憂いていた。三つ目は女性のもので、『ロップイヤークレッパ』について話していた。
ロード・キャプテンは3人の珍しい告白を聞いた。二つは男性から、一つは女性から。これらのメッセージの送り主を探すには、上級士官が良い出発点となる。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat drei ungewöhnliche Beichten gehört, die {mf|ihn|sie} interessieren. Die beiden ersten Stimmen schienen männlich zu sein. Während die eine das Schicksal der im Warp Verstorbenen beklagte, sorgte sich die andere um das Wohlbefinden der Waisen an Bord des Schiffs. Die dritte Beichte kam von einer Frau und erwähnte 'Hängeohr-Kleppas'.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain heard three unusual confessions that interested {mf|him|her}. The first two voices seemed to be male: one lamented the fate of those who have died in the warp, while the other was concerned about the well-being of orphans aboard the ship. The third confession came from a woman and mentioned "lop-eared kleppas."

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat drei ungewöhnliche Beichten gehört, die {mf|ihn|sie} interessieren. Die beiden ersten Stimmen schienen männlich zu sein. Während die eine das Schicksal der im Warp Verstorbenen beklagte, sorgte sich die andere um das Wohlbefinden der Waisen an Bord des Schiffs. Die dritte Beichte kam von einer Frau und erwähnte 'Hängeohr-Kleppas'.

Der Lord Captain hat drei ungewöhnliche Beichten gehört, die {mf|ihn|sie} interessieren. Zwei kamen von Männern, eine von einer Frau. Hochrangige Offiziere sind ein guter Ausgangspunkt für die Suche nach den Absendern dieser Nachrichten.
